attributes.additional_details: All security officers should be armed to a level. They should take firearms training and after passing training should be able to carry a 9mm lethal firearm and a non lethal firearm that fires rubber bullets. Ex-ample : if a person is a danger to the public with illegal firearms or any kind of firearm risk. Security officers should approach with lethal 9mm firearms, if its a situation where a person is a danger to the public with knifes the security officers should use non lethal rubber bullets to take down the target.
